item.title: Node.js Core: buffer: revert GetBackingStore optimization in API
item.description: PR #44579 by kvakil. In an earlier PR, I replaced a lot of instances of `GetBackingStore()->Data()` with `Data()`. Apparently these two are not equivalent in the case of zero-length buffers: the former returns a "valid" address, while the latter returns `NULL`. At least one library in the ecosystem (see the referenced i... View PR

item.title: Node.js Core: perf: optimize process.nextTick with object pooling and batch processing
item.description: PR #59306 by abdidvp. ## Summary Optimize the `process.nextTick()` hot path through object pooling, argument array pooling, buffer reuse, and batch processing. These changes reduce allocations, improve cache locality, and lower GC pressure, yielding **15–53% throughput gains** across realistic patterns while preservin... View PR

item.title: Node.js Core: docs: fix tty.ReadStream constructor placement
item.description: PR #59016 by Jianru-Lin. The `new tty.ReadStream(fd[, options])` constructor documentation was incorrectly placed under the `tty.WriteStream` class heading. This commit moves the documentation for the `tty.ReadStream` constructor to its correct location under the `tty.ReadStream` class heading, improving the accuracy and... View PR

item.title: Node.js Core: doc: inject sidebar active link scroll into view script
item.description: PR #59007 by btea. When searching for the API in the Quick Flower Cutting module, each time you switch to a different module, the content in the sidebar scrolls to the top, and the currently active link is not immediately visible.

item.title: Node.js Core: feat: add support for 'electron' condition in conditional exports
item.description: PR #59002 by Momena-akhtar. ### Description This PR adds support for resolving "electron" condition in both ESM and CommonJS module resolution, based on process.versions.electron. Useful for runtime-specific exports for Electron apps. Resolves electron/electron#47670... View PR

item.title: Website Team: chore: remove blog data from providers, cache snippets
item.description: PR #8243 by avivkeller. This PR does two things (since they are both related to providers): 1. It switches the `downloadSnippets` provider to `"use cache"`, this was a very simple change. 2. It removes the `websiteFeeds` and `blogData` providers in favor of two additional `utils` (`feeds` and `blog`, respectively). T... View PR

item.description: PR #1588 by MasonM. ## Description BATS was initially added to this repository in https://github.com/nodejs/docker-node/pull/802, but was then removed in https://github.com/nodejs/docker-node/pull/1339. item.description: PR #2136 by zZHorizonZz. ## Description This PR introduces official support for building windows based docker images for node.
